original_text: And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power was to hurt men five months.
korean_text: 또 전갈과 같은 꼬리와 쏘는 살이 있어 그 꼬리에는 다섯 달 동안 사람들을 해하는 권세가 있더라

sentences.original_text: And they had tails like unto scorpions
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 전갈과 같은 꼬리를 가졌고

sentences.original_text: and there were stings in their tails
and their power was to hurt men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 능력은 사람들을 상하게 하는 것이었고
